headlines.title: DU Names New Women’s Basketball Coach

paragraphs.text: “You have to show up every day, and you have to work.”

That was the message from Jim Turgeon to his players as he was introduced on Tuesday as the 10th women’s basketball head coach at the University of Denver. Turgeon comes to DU from Colorado State University_Pueblo, where he spent the last two seasons compiling a 54_10 record, the highest by any coach in school history.
